name: Manu Sharma
title: UI Developer
careerObjective: Seeking opportunity to work as Team Lead/Developer in your esteemed organization where skills are given a wider perspective and an individual's diligence is accredited. Willing to inculcate my product managerial skills along with the IT skills with significant emphasis into the role in order to expand business & create new opportunities
careerSummary: Total 9+ years of professional I.T. experience which includes project leadership, development, Support.
1.6 Years of NPI Product development experience as Senior Developer in Eaton
3.8 year of experience as developer in TCS.
3.11 years of experience as develop and Team Lead in Accenture.

Good Coding Skills in Angular 7, Angular Material 7, HTML5, CSS [2 & 3] both LESS & SASS, Typescript, Javascript,Angular JS, Handlebars [Template], core Java. (Previous Eaton projects using Angular 5 and Angular Material 5)
Good problem solving skills with a strong technical background and good interpersonal skills.
Experience in working in Agile Methodology of Software Project Development with Scrum and Sprint
